summary: Stops Aerin from creeping on Mjoll the Lioness after she is married.
descriptionHtml:
In love with Mjoll but put off by her shadowy sidekick?


Aerin Restraining Order is a simple mod that stops Aerin, self-righteous, smile-wearing,
stalker/creep extraordinaire, from following Mjoll the Lioness around Skyrim after she is
married to the player. Instead, he will remain in his house in Riften and go through the same
daily routine that he would if Mjoll were your active follower.

This mod will be incompatible with any that change Aerin's AI packages directly, but should
work fine with anything that changes Mjoll the Lioness.

Also check out MrPingy's mod at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11899
He, too, wants to banish that creep to the void.


Installation
-------------
Extract AerinRestrainingOrder.esp to your Skyrim\Data folder. For Steam, this is:

Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data

Copy/paste works fine too. So does clicking and dragging directly to folder.

Version 0.1 is the current version. It has tested OK and bug-free.
author: Jovian09
